Option=1000: # Description: The number of miles an electric vehicle is driven in a year if the unit owns an electric vehicle.

# Description: Because EVs drive less miles/year than ICE (https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S254243512300404X?via%3Dihub#abs0015), the max value is capped at 22,500 miles/yr and the distribution is shifted to reduce the mean.
# Source: Constructed using the 2022 U.S. Federal Highway Administration National Household Travel Survey (NHTS) microdata.
